column5: Fished a small club tourney on Sat, had a small victory with 13.78lb bag.   If anyone plays CS or any other FPS, you'll understand my concept of FPF. If you don't, its like POV.  For the best quality, try watching the video in 720p and full screen.    The videos are relatively very short, the size of these new HD files are very hard to work with. I'll try to include actual sound and longer video next time. Stay tuned! Equipment: GoPro HDHero in r4 setting (960p 1280X960)
Cool vids.  Looks like a good time!  Congrats on the win too!

Nice work young one. Sorry for being a bit critical but your deck looks like an accident waiting to happen. Please don't take this the wrong way, it looks like you got some high priced equipment there. Thanks for the video. That was cool!  Cheers, Slayer
Simon, the grasshopper has much more to learn and prove...  That deck wasn't as bad as I've seen it...
you haven't seen my deck    cool video, what make of camera, I know you want wide angle but the fisheye distortion is a bit more then I would want
Looks to me like the proof is in the winning, but I see either a snapped rod or limb in young grasshopper's future. Nice to see you back Geoff. Now get busy and add our 60" of upgrades.  Simon
Cool videos young_one   Love watching them Congrats on the win   :clapping:
Whew... I'm glad I read that twice  :unsure:  Slayer
good job. I also see the money sticking out of your pocket which is even better. congratz.
Whoa, nice stuff, but those hat-cams give me motion sickness.
